en.title: Enter your Criminal Injuries Compensation Authority Reference Number
en.line1: You can find this on any correspondence that you've received from CICA, CICA reference numbers begin with the letter X or G

cy.title: Nodwch eich Cyfeirnod Awdurdod Digolledu am Anafiadau Troseddol
cy.line1: Gallwch ddod o hyd i hwn ar unrhyw ohebiaeth rydych wedi'i derbyn gan ADAT, Mae cyfeirnodau ADAT yn dechrau gyda’r lythyren X neu G

cicaReferenceNumber.containsMarkdownLink: CICA reference number must not include a link
cicaReferenceNumber.containsInvalidCharacters: CICA reference number must not include HTML

cicaReferenceNumber.containsMarkdownLink: Ni ddylai cyfeirnod ADAT gynnwys dolen
cicaReferenceNumber.containsInvalidCharacters: Ni ddylai cyfeirnod ADAT gynnwys HTML
